short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search over 120 websites, add your own search page, site search(current URL), image search, cite(current URL) and TabList.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Super Scholar Search streamlines your research and web searching with powerful features (zero user tracking): 
- Search across 100+ pre-configured websites simultaneously 
- Create and save your own custom search collections 
- Search within any website using Google's site search 
- Quick access to Google Lens for image searches 
- Generate citations for current web pages 
- Manage and organize your browser tabs - Clear browsing data with one click 
- Green indicators for standard web pages 

Simple and intuitive interface Perfect for Students doing research, Professionals gathering information, Anyone who wants to search multiple sites efficiently. All features are readily accessible through a clean popup interface. No complicated setup required - just install and start searching smarter! Please try Awesome TabMarks, and for medical research PubMed Citation Bar, two other great extensions (100% free, zero tracking).
